experiences.name: cgi
experiences.title: Engineer in Information Technologies at CGI (among the leading independent information technology and business services firms in the world)

tasks.content: Java development on CMSs (Content Management System)

achievements.content: Development on Liferay 6.2 and Jahia 6: JEE (Java Enterprise Edition) based CMS (Content Management System) for big clients. My mission was mostly to develop portlets using Java, JSP, JQuery, JavaScript libraries (such as DataTables, Bootstrap, Validate …) and CSS to answer our clients’ needs.
Integration of a BPMN (Business Process Model and Notation), Bonita 6, into a Liferay web portal.
Content resemption of websites into Jahia.
Jahia developement of websites with JQuery, CSS, HTML 5 and Java.

experiences.name: orange

achievements.content: Websites development of internal use for incident tracking with Flex and PHP technologies using Bootstrap, MySQL
Application administration of an incident tracking tool.
Presentations and training for 1 to 10 people on the developed websites.

tasks.content: Excel VBA tool conception for a project monitoring panel
